insert into issuehistory (issue_id, project_id, start_date, end_date, state_code, type, reg_date, reg_id) values ( #{issue_num}, #{project_num}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{state_code}, 'issue', #{his_date}, #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: select * from issuehistory where issue_id = #{issue_id} order by reg_date desc limit 1

SELECT a.issue_id, a.project_id, a.issue_name, a.issue_detail, a.reg_id, d.state_code, d.state_name, c.start_date, c.end_date FROM issue a JOIN issuehistory c ON a.issue_id = c.issue_id AND a.his_date = c.reg_date JOIN state d ON c.state_code = d.state_code WHERE a.issue_id = #{issue_id} AND d.type = 'issue'
